short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This would search YouTube for the selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can be used to search a phrase in YouTube. You can select a text on any page, right click and select the extension. It will open a new tab and will show the search results from YouTube. Alternately, you can use the search box in the extension popup window by clicking the icon on the address bar.
